trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hamilton
There were no other sightings in Hamilton on or around July 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on High street bridge, Hamilton,Ohio. Southside. waiting for fireworks around 9:30 getting dark. to my right, west, 2000feet up was a hovering object no sound after watching for about 15 minutes, realized it was not a helicopter. could see it was a flat shape with green light on right, red light on left, a bright white light in middle. it would twist staying flat and I could see the left red light then twist back and I could see green light. I realized it was twisting because of the lights. I watched for about an hour during and after fireworks. It slowly started moving back southwest. went to get my car and followed it lost sight of it.
Summary: Hovering lights green and red and white in the middle from my angel it was flat about the size of a small plane.
